arcade.env.comp

Class PatternSites

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.env.comp.Sites
      • arcade.env.comp.PatternSites
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Component, java.io.Serializable, sim.engine.Steppable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TriPatternSites

    public abstract class PatternSites
extends Sites
    Extension of Sites for pattern sites.

    A repeating pattern of lattice indices are assigned as sites, defined by tesselating the "unit cell" of the pattern across the entire lattice.

    The amount of concentration added to each index is the difference between the concentration at the index and the source concentration of the molecule. Three hemodynamic factors can be optionally included (RELATIVE_FRACTION) with variable weights to reduce the amount of concentration added.

    • WEIGHT_FLOW = consumption upstream of a given lattice site
    • WEIGHT_LOCAL = local cell consumption of the molecule at a given lattice site
    • WEIGHT_GRADIENT = concentration difference between source and a given lattice site

    Sites can be damaged by setting the PATTERN_DAMAGE parameter, which also reduces the amount of concentration added at each index.

    Since:
    2.3
    Version:
    2.3.20
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • makeSites

        public void makeSites(Simulation sim)
        Creates sites.

        Defines sites by copying the pattern unit cell across the lattice. Initial damage array is set to 1.0 (no damage).

        Parameters:
        sim - the simulation instance.

      • getDamage

        public double[][][] getDamage()
        Gets the damage array.
        Returns:
        the array of damage values

      • step

        public void step(sim.engine.SimState state)
        Steps through the lattice for each molecule to calculate generation.
        Parameters:
        state - the MASON simulation state

      • updateComponent

        public void updateComponent(Simulation sim,
                            Location oldLoc,
                            Location newLoc)
        Updates the component with old and new locations.

        Damage increases for movement into and out of a location.

        Parameters:
        sim - the simulation instance
        oldLoc - the old location
        newLoc - the new location

      • equip

        public void equip(MiniBox molecule,
                  double[][][] delta,
                  double[][][] current,
                  double[][][] previous)
        Equips a molecule to the sites.

        For each molecule, the following parameters are required:

        • CONCENTRATION = source concentration of molecule
        Parameters:
        molecule - the molecule parameters
        delta - the array holding changes in concentration
        current - the array holding current concentration values
        previous - the array holding previous concentration values

      • toJSON

        public java.lang.String toJSON()
        Represents object as a JSON entry.

        The JSON is formatted as: 

             {
         "type": "SITE",
         "class": "pattern",
         "specs" : {
             "SPEC_NAME": spec value,
             "SPEC_NAME": spec value,
             ...
         }
     }
        Returns:
        the JSON string
